title: Hypnotic journey with Hana / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS TECHNIQUES
description:
Hana is one of Dr. Marco Paret's most successful students. She is a professional hypnotherapist. Here she is at his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass to exercise with the other students. She induced strong hypnotic magnetic state. Dr. Paret is teaching Fascination and Mesmerism, from the ancient traditions. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
